raw_body: SENANAYAKE – MAUREEN GERTRUDE MAMELTA (nee Rodrigo) At Rest with Jesus. Beloved wife of late Peter,​ loving mother of Tony,​ Marie and Rufus,​ mother-in-law of Dayanthi and Pam,​ sister of late Patrick,​ late Aloysius and of Humphrey,​ sister-in-law of late Mary,​ late Veronica and of Angela. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ Borella from 10.00 a.m. on Sunday,​ 04th February. Cortege leaves parlour at 10.15 a.m. on Monday,​ 05th February 2024 for burial at Jawatte Cemetery at 10.30 a.m.008373
